zh.detail_paragraph_one: EtcGame作为革命性的全新平台，允许加密货币粉丝参与预测并使用完全安全和透明的方法投注。我们的系统使用智能合约技术，具备完全透明、不可更改、不可篡改的功能，确保参与者无需第三方信任即可使用ETC执行投注。
zh.detail_paragraph_two: 以太经典是一个运作智能合约的去中心化平台。智能合约完全按照程序运行，不会出现停机，审查，欺诈或第三方干扰的可能性。 以太经典秉承以太坊原链 -保留了未经篡改的历史; 不受外部干扰和对交易的主观篡改。
zh.detail_paragraph_three: 参与者作出预测并将以太经典（ETC）充入智能合约。预测周期结束后，智能合约自动检测受信任的第三方获得预测结果，向参与者分配彩金。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: 如果比赛结果无法得到正式确认，本平台将有权利保留延迟派彩直至得到官方的正式确认。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: 如果某个投注项目出现在已经有比赛结果之后仍接受投注，本平台则保留作废该投注的权利。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: 如果赔率明显有误，本平台保留取消该投注的权利。这包括比平均市场大于一倍赔率误差。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: 如果直播停顿而比赛并未受影响，所有投注类型会根据正式比赛结果派彩。当某个投注类型比赛结果无法得到正式确认，本平台保留作废该投注的权利。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: 本平台有权在任何时候纠正错误派彩。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: 如果赛事并不是依据正规形式进行(例如异常赛时，统计步骤，赛事格式等)，平台保留作废该投注的权利。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: 如果一个赛事的规则或格式异于本平台接受的标准，本平台保留作废该投注的权利。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: 所有投注类型将依据正规的赛时除非有另外标明。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: 如果赛事无法完成或继续(例如鉴于取消资格，受到干扰，退出比赛，抽签有所改变等)，所有未能确定的投注类型无效。若有其他未被规则涵盖的项目，平台将保留做出针对个案最终性决定的权利，并且确保公平公正。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: 所有投注类型(除了半场，上半场，加时赛，点球赛)将以比赛的常规时间为准。 如果一项比赛被干扰但是在开赛后48小时内继续比赛，所有有效投注依据最终比赛结果派彩，而所有未决定的投注作废。 常规90分钟：除非另有标明，否则足球投注的结算将以比赛的常规时间为准。包括伤停补时但不包括加时赛和点球赛的成绩。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: 比赛或市场结果无法被找到的，则在开球后24小时后预测无效。
zh.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: 比赛时间、比赛数据和结果将从信誉良好的第三方获取。
zh.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: 夺冠投注是指投注全联盟或联赛的结果，而非一场比赛结果。夺冠投注通常在赛季开始前下注，但也可在联赛过程中投注。每个国家的赔率不同。
zh.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: 也即三向投注，通常同于预测主客场胜负或平手结果。
zh.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: 例如，您选择预测英格兰和德国的比赛结果，可以两者投其一，或者猜平手。每个结果的赔率不同。
zh.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: 这种玩法加入了对球队技术的考虑，对强队而言可以让分。也即，强队不但要赢得比赛，还需要以确定的进球数超过弱队。这避免了比赛踢平的结果，让预测成为五五开的选择。
zh.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: 注意：球队成绩栏的加号表示“或更多”，如，“2+”表示“2球或更多”‘。
zh.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: 可能性比较小的情况是，当整数用于让分盘时，让分调整的最终比分可能导致平手。这种情况不算作平手，而是走盘（push）。发生走盘的，所有参与者的原始投注资金将会被退还，也即没有赢家。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_content: 如果任何一队以任何比分胜出，投注该队获胜的为赢。如为平局，所有投注计为作废，投注金退还。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: 球队以任何比分胜出 - 投注项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: 平局 - 投注于此项的一半投注金退还客户。另一半的投注被判为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_fou: 球队以任何比分输 - 此项投注为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_six: 球队以任何比分胜出 - 投注项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_sev: 平局 - 一半投注按照所选项赔率进行结算，另一半投注退还客户。
zh.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_eig: 球队以任何比分输 - 此项投注为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_content_two: 球队以任何比分胜出 - 投注项为赢。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_content_three: 平局 - 此项投注为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_05_content_four: 球队以任何比分输 - 此项投注为输。

zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_thr: 球队以多于对方正好一球胜出 - 一半投注按照所选项赔率进行结算，另一半投注退还客户。

zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_six: 平局或以任何比分赢得赛事 - 投注项为赢。

zh.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_eig: 球队输掉至少两球 - 此项投注为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_1_content_two: 球队以多于对方至少两球胜出 - 投注项为赢。

zh.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: 大小球投注也即预测体育预测中给定比赛的一项统计数字（通常是两队比分之和），参与者预测的比赛实际数字应比该数字大或小。
zh.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: - 如果比赛中没有进球或只有一个进球，投注为赢。如果刚好有两个进球，投注金被退还。如果有三个或更多的进球，投注为输。
- 如果比赛中有三个或更多的进球，投注为赢。如果刚好有两个进球，投注金被退还。如果没有进球或只有一个进球，投注为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_2_25_handicap_co: - 如果比赛中没有进球或只有一个进球，投注为赢。如果刚好有两个进球，则一半投注金为赢，另一半将被返还。如果有三个或更多的进球，投注为输。
- 如果比赛中有三个或更多的进球，投注为赢。如果刚好有两个进球，则一半投注金将被返还，另一半为输。如果没有进球或只有一个进球，投注为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_25_handicap_cont: - 如果比赛中没有进球或是只有一个或两个进球，投注为赢。如果有三个或更多的进球，投注为输。
- 如果比赛中有三个或更多的进球，投注为赢。如果没有进球或是只有一个或两个进球，投注为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_25_3_handicap_co: - 如果比赛中没有进球或只有一个或两个进球，投注为赢。如果刚好有三个进球，一半投注金将被返还，另一半为输。如果有四个或更多的进球，投注为输。
- 如果比赛中有四个或更多进球，投注为赢。如果刚好有三个进球，一半投注金将被返还，另一半为赢。如果没有进球或是只有一个或两个进球，投注为输。
zh.detail_football_explain_3_handicap_conte: - 如果比赛中没有进球或只有一个或两个进球，投注为赢。如果刚好有三个进球，投注金将被返还。如果有四个或更多的进球，投注为输。
- 如果比赛中有四个或更多的进球，投注为赢。如果刚好有三个进球，投注金将被返还。如果没有进球或只有一个或两个进球，投注为输。
zh.detail_game_content_one: 所有电子竞技投注皆以法定完场时间的赛事结果为准，除非特别声明。若赛事结果不允许出现和局，因而进行的加时赛的赛事结果将被视为最终有效赛事结果。所有赛事的投注结算以相关赛事组织方所公布的官方最终赛事结果为准。
zh.detail_game_content_two: 基于一些无法预测的情况 - 比如作弊- 组办单位可以推翻赛果,该赛事所有的投注作废及退还。 如果组办单位宣布该场比赛为不战先胜 - 即比赛从未开始而其中的队伍获胜 - 则所有投注作废。 如果一支队伍或队员在比赛进行中退赛,则根据正式赛果派彩给只已完成投注项目的有效投注。投注类型如胜负盘，让球盘以及总比分结果将被作废,除非比赛完整完成。
zh.detail_game_content_three: 在只有一支队伍参赛或另一队告退，则所有未决定的投注类型作废。
zh.detail_game_content_four: 如果赛事没有完整完成，则所有未决定的投注类型作废。
zh.detail_game_content_five: 如果赛事基于中断或因技术问题而非参赛者问题的情况造成重赛，则所有未决定的投注类型作废。
zh.detail_game_content_seven: 如果标准赛事数量被更改或有别于投注站提供的数目，平台保留作废投注的权利。
zh.detail_game_explain_champion_content_one: 预先投注于完整赛季最终赛果，比如联赛冠军，获胜小组，参赛者以及竞赛有关的最终位置，哪一轮被淘汰，或队伍和参赛者排名。总冠军投注项目只有赢的奖金或输赌注两种结果。
zh.detail_finance_content_one: 所有投注在预测规定的时间和日期后结算。
zh.detail_finance_content_two: 市场交易数据、交易结果将从信誉良好的第三方取得。
zh.detail_finance_content_three: 如果市场基于技术问题未获得有效数据或数据无法得到确认，平台有权利保留延迟派彩直至得到可信任第三方的数据确认。
zh.detail_finance_content_four: 如果市场找不到可信第三方数据确认，预测无效，投注将退还。
zh.detail_finance_content_five: 本平台有权在任何时候纠正错误派彩。
zh.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: 收盘时间以世界统一时间（UTC) 0点为准。收盘价按各市场成交量加权平均值计算得出。
zh.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: 投注项目只有上涨或下跌两种结果；如果遇到涨跌幅为0%，投注将退还。
zh.detail_finance_number_asset_content_thre: 市场交易数据、交易结果以https://coinmarketcap.com/为准。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_one: 如果开奖结果无法得到正式确认，本平台将有权利保留延迟派彩直至得到官方的正式确认。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_two: 如果赔率明显有误，本平台保留取消该投注的权利。这包括比平均市场大于一倍赔率误差。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_three: 如果直播停顿而开奖结果并未受影响，所有投注类型会根据结果派彩。当某个投注类型结果无法得到正式确认，本平台保留作废该投注的权利。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_four: 本平台有权在任何时候纠正错误派彩。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_five: 如果一个彩票的规则或格式异于本平台接受的标准，本平台保留作废该投注的权利。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_six: 彩票开奖结果无法被找到的，则在彩票开奖后24小时后预测无效。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: 彩票数据和结果将从信誉良好的第三方获取。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: 中国福利彩票，开奖信息可在http://www.cwl.gov.cn查询。
zh.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: 韩国Lotto，开奖信息可在http://www.nlotto.co.kr查询。
zh.detail_notice: 如有遇到任何问题，请通过客服email与我们联系：support@etcgame.com

en.detail_paragraph_one: ETCgame is a revolutionary new platform that allows crypto enthusiasts to predict event outcomes and place a wager using a totally secure and transparent method with Ethereum Classic. Our system uses smart contracts, which are transparent, unalterable and tamper-proof, ensuring that participants do not have to trust a third party to honor the wager.
en.detail_paragraph_two: Ethereum Classic is a decentralized platform that runs smart contracts: applications that run exactly as programmed without any downtime, censorship, fraud or third-party interference. It is a continuation of the original Ethereum blockchain - the classic version preserving untampered history; free from external interference and subjective tampering of transactions.
en.detail_paragraph_three: Participants make a prediction and deposit Ethereum Classic tokens into the smart contract. Once the prediction period is over, the smart contract automatically checks a trusted third party for the result of the prediction and divides the winnings among the participants.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: If the results of the competition cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to retain or delay the payout until an official confirmation is obtained.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: If a prediction item appears to be accepted after the result of a competition, the platform reserves the right to void such a prediction.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: If the odds are obviously wrong, the platform reserves the right to cancel the relevant prediction. This includes more than one odds error than the average market odds.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: If the live broadcast is paused but the competition is not affected, all prediction types will be awarded based on official results. When the results of the competition of a certain prediction type cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: The platform reserves the right to correct wrong payouts at any time.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: If the event is not based on a formal form (such as unusual time, statistical steps, event formats, etc.), the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: If the rules, or format of an event, differ from the standards accepted by the platform, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: All prediction types will be based on regular time of competition unless otherwise indicated.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: If the event cannot be completed or continued (for example, due to disqualification, distraction, withdrawal from the game, lottery change, etc.), all undetermined prediction types shall be deemed invalid. If there are other items not covered by the rules, the platform will reserve the right to make final decisions to ensure fairness and justice.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: All prediction types (except for halftime, first half, overtime, penalty kicks) will be based on the regular time of the competition. If a competition is disrupted, but resumes within 48 hours of the kickoff, all valid predictions will be awarded based on the final result and all undetermined predictions will be void. Regular 90 minutes: unless otherwise stated, the settlement of soccer prediction will be based on the regular completion time. This includes injury time but does not include overtime and penalty kicks.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: If the competition or market results cannot be found, the prediction is invalid 24 hours after the kickoff.
en.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: Competition time, data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
en.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: Outright prediction is a prediction placed on the outcome of an entire league or competition rather than on an individual game. Outright predictions are usually placed before the season starts but are also available even during the course of the competition. Each country carries its own odds.
en.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: Also known as three-way prediction, this is often used for games which can result in a home win, draw or away win.
en.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: For example, let’s say you want to make a prediction on the England vs Germany match, you would be able to predict that either England or Germany wins, OR that the match will end in a draw. Each result carries its own odds.
en.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: This form of prediction takes the skills of the soccer teams into consideration and applies a handicap to the stronger team. This means that the stronger team must not only win, but also exceed the weaker team by a prescribed number of goals. This precludes the match from ending in a draw, leaving the prediction as a binary choice with a near 50/50 chance of success.
en.detail_terms_scores_results: Handicap and outcomes are as follows:
en.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: NB: The plus signs in the Team Outcome columns indicate 'or more', e.g., '2+' means 'by 2 goals or more'.
en.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: In the unlikely event that a whole number is used for the handicap, the handicap-adjusted final score could result in a draw. This situation is not a draw, but a push. In the event of a push, all participants have their original wagers returned as there is no winner.
en.detail_football_explain_0_content: If either team wins by any margin, they (the winning team) are to be considered as the winning selection. In the event of a draw, all predictions are void and stakes are refunded.

en.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: Big or Small will predict a number for a statistic in a given game (usually the combined score of the two teams), and participants predict that the actual number in the game will be either higher or lower than that number.
en.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: -If there is no goal or only one goal, this prediction wins. If there are two goals, the wager will be returned. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are three or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, the wager will be returned. If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction loses.
en.detail_football_explain_2_25_handicap_co: -If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, half wager is treated as a win, and the other half will be returned. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a loss. If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction loses.
en.detail_football_explain_25_handicap_cont: -If there is no goal or 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
en.detail_football_explain_25_3_handicap_co: -If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a loss. If there are 4 or more goals, the prediction loses.

-If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a win. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
en.detail_football_explain_3_handicap_conte: -If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, the wager will be returned. If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, the wager will be returned. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
en.detail_game_content_one: All eSports predictions are subject to the results of the official time of the event, unless otherwise stated. If the outcome of the event does not allow for a draw, the outcome of the overtime event will be considered as the final effective result. The prediction settlement for all events is subject to the official final event results announced by the relevant event organizer.
en.detail_game_content_two: Based on some unpredictable situations, such as cheating, the organizer can overturn the results and all predictions on the event will be voided and refunded. If the organizer announces that the competition is a win by no matching, that is, the match never starts and the team wins, all predictions are void. If a team or team members withdraw during the game, a valid prediction will be awarded based on the official results. If the prediction type is win or lose, the ball and the match totals will be void unless the match is completed.
en.detail_game_content_three: In the event that only one team enters or the other team withdraws, all undetermined prediction types are void.
en.detail_game_content_four: If the event is not completed, all undetermined prediction types will be void.
en.detail_game_content_five: If the match is based on a break or a replay due to a technical issue rather than a contestant issue, all undetermined prediction types are void.
en.detail_game_content_six: The replay will be handled separately.
en.detail_game_content_seven: The platform reserves the right to void predictions if the number of standard events is changed or different from the number provided by the prediction station.
en.detail_game_explain_champion_content_one: For pre-prediction of the final results of the full season, such as the league title, the winning team, the final standing of the contestants and the competition, the round where it is eliminated, or the standing of the team and the contestant – the championship prediction has only two outcomes: win or lose.
en.detail_finance_content_one: All predictions are settled after the time and dates specified in the prediction.
en.detail_finance_content_two: Market trading data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
en.detail_finance_content_three: If the market does not have valid data based on technical issues, or the data cannot be confirmed, the platform has the right to retain the delayed payout until it is confirmed by a trusted third party.
en.detail_finance_content_four: If the market cannot find data confirmation from a trusted third party, the prediction will be invalid and the stake will be refunded.
en.detail_finance_content_five: The platform reserves the right to correct wrong payouts at any time.
en.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: The closing time is based on 0 UTC. The closing price is calculated based on the weighted average of the volume of each market.
en.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: Prediction selections only have two outcomes: up or down; if there is 0% up/down, the prediction will be refunded.
en.detail_finance_number_asset_content_thre: 市场交易数据、交易结果以https://coinmarketcap.com/为准。
en.detail_lottery_title_content_one: If the results of the lottery cannot be formally confirmed, the platform will have the right to retain the delayed payout until an official confirmation is obtained.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_two: If the odds are obviously wrong, the platform reserves the right to cancel the prediction. This includes more than one odds error than the average market odds.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_three: If the live broadcast is paused and the lottery results are not affected, all prediction types will be awarded based on the results. When the result of a prediction type cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_four: The platform reserves the right to correct the wrong payouts at any time.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_five: If the rules or format of a lottery is different from the standard accepted by the platform, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_six: If the results of the lottery cannot be found, the prediction will become invalid after 24 hours of the result announcement.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: Lottery data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: China Welfare Lottery, the lottery information can be found at http://www.cwl.gov.cn.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: South Korea Lotto, the lottery information can be found at http://www.nlotto.co.kr.
en.detail_lottery_title_content_ten: US PowerBall, the lottery information can be found at https://www.powerball.com/.
en.detail_notice: If you have any problems, please contact us via customer service email: support@etcgame.com

ko.detail_paragraph_one: ETC Game은 투명하고 안전한 방법으로 크립토 팬들이 이벤트 결과를 예측을 할 수 있게 하는 혁신적인 새로운 플랫폼이다. 이 시스템은  ‘스마트 계약’라고 불리는 첨단 기술을 사용하여 투명하고, 수정이 불가하며 참가자들이 예측 시 제 3자를 필요로 하지 않다.
ko.detail_paragraph_two: 이더리움 클래식은 스마트 계약을 운영하는 분산화된 플랫폼으로 오류, 검사, 사기 또는 제 3자의 간섭의 가능성 없이 프로그래밍된 대로 실행되는 어플리케이션이다. 이것은 변경되지 않은 역사를 보존하고 외부의 간섭으로부터 자유로운 버전으로, 오리지널 이더리움 블록체인의 연장이다.
ko.detail_paragraph_three: 참가자들은 경기의 승패를 예측하여 이더리움 클래식 토큰을 스마트 계약에 예치시킨다. 승패 예측 기간이 끝나면 스마트 계약은 자동으로 신뢰할 수 있는 제 3자가 예측 결과를 확인하고 참가자들의 상금을 나눈다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: 경기 결과를 공식적으로 확인할 수없는 경우 플랫폼은 공식적인 공식 확인이 이루어질 때까지 지연된 지불금을 보유 할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: 경기 결과가 확정된 항목에서 여전히 배팅이 가능할 경우, 플랫폼은 해당 예측 항목을 폐지할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: 배당률이 현저하게 오류로 판단되는 경우, 플랫폼은 해당 항목을 취소 할 수있는 권한을 보유한다. 배당률이 오류로 판단되는 경우는 평균 시장 배당률보다 2배 이상의 확률 오차가 있는 것을 기준으로 한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: 생방송이 일시 중지 된 상태지만 경기가 중단되지 않으면 모든 경기 유형이 공식 경기 결과에 따라 확정된다. 배팅의 결과를 공식적으로 확인할 수없는 경우, 플랫폼은 배팅을 무효화 할 권한을 보유한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: 플랫폼은 언제든지 잘못된 판매 배팅을 수정할 권리가 있습니다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: 경기가 정규형식(예를 들면 경기 이슈, 통계 절차, 경기 형식 등)으로 진행이 되지 않았을 경우, 플랫폼은 배팅을 취소할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: 경기의 규치 또는 격식이 플랫폼의 기준과 일치하지 않을 경우, 플랫폼은 해당 배팅을 폐지할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: 모든 배팅 유형은 정규 경기 시간을 근거로 하며, 기타 이슈가 있을 시, 별도로 표시한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: 만약 경기가 정상적으로 완료 또는 지속(예를 들면 자격취소, 방해, 퇴장, 추점등 내용이 변경될 경우 등)될 수 없을 경우, 모든 확인되지 않은 배팅유형은 무효로 처리된다. 만약, 규칙상 명확히 규정된 내용이 있을 경우, 플랫폼은 공평성을 유지하는 전제하에 해당 항목에 대한 결정권을 소유한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: 모든 배팅 유형은(반전, 전반전, 추가시간, 패널티킥전 제외) 경기의 규정시간을 기준으로 한다. 만약 경기가 이슈로 인해 예상시간보다 늦어졌지만 경기시작 후 48시간 내에 경기가 계속될 경우, 모든 배팅은 최종결과를 기준으로 하며 여전히 유효하지만, 경기결과가 없는 배팅은 모두 폐기된다. 일반 경기시간90분: 별도 공지가 없는한, 축구경기의 배팅 결과는 경기의 일반시간을 기준으로 한다. 추가시간은 포함하나 연장전과 패널티킥전 결과는 포함하지 않는다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: 결과를 알 수 없는 게임이나 시장은 게임이 시작된 지 24시간 후에 예측이 무효화 되는 결과를 초래한다.
ko.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: 타이밍, 경기 통계 및 결과는 제 3자 출처 (예: bet365)를 통해 가져온다.
ko.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: 아웃라이트 예측은 개인 게임이 아니라 리그나 경기의 전체 결과에 대한 예측이다. 대개 시즌이 시작되기 전에 아웃라이트 예측을 하지만 경기 중에도 가능합니다. 각 나라마다 각자의 가능성이 있다.
ko.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: 3차 예측으로도 알려져 있는 이 예측은 종종 홈 승리, 무승부 또는 원정 승리를 가져올 수 있는 게임에 사용된다.
ko.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: 예를 들어, 여러분이 영국과 독일의 경기에서 예측을 하고 싶다고 가정해 본다. 여러분은 영국이나 독일 중 하나가 이기거나 경기가 무승부로 끝날 것이라고 예측할 수 있다. 각각의 결과는 나름대로 가능성이 있다.
ko.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: 이런 형태의 예측은 축구 팀들의 기술을 고려하고 더 강한 팀에 핸디캡을 적용한다. 이 것은 더 강한 팀이 지정된 수의 골로 이길 뿐만 아니라 더 약한 팀을 능가해야 한다는 것을 의미합니다. 이것은 예측이 성공할 확률이 거의 50대 50인 2진법으로 끝나는 것을 막아준다.
ko.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: 주의: 팀 결과 열의 더하기 기호는 예를 들어 “또는 그 이상”을 나타낸다. “2+”는 “2골 이상”을 의미한다.
ko.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: 드문 경우이긴 하지만 전체 번호가 핸디캡에 사용된 경우, 핸디캡 조정 최종 점수가 추첨으로 이어질 수 있다. 이 상황은 무승부가 아니라 푸시다. 푸시의 경우, 우승자가 없기 때문에 모든 참가자들은 원래의 예측금을 되돌려 받다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_content: 어느 한 팀이라도 어느 정도 이기면 우승 팀으로 결정된다. 무승부 시 모든 예측은 무효가 되며 예측금은 환불된다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: - 점수에 상관 없이 우승 – 이 선택에 대한 모든 예측은 우승자이다.
ko.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: - 무승부 - 지분의 절반만 돌려 받는다. 지분의 나머지 절반은 돌려받지 못한다.

ko.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: 오버/언더 예측은 스포츠 북이 주어진 게임 (일반적으로 두 팀의 종합 점수)에서 통계 숫자를 예측하는 예측이며, 참가자들은 해당 게임의 실제 숫자가 더 높거나 더 높을 것을 예측한다.
ko.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: 골이 없거나 한 골만 있으면 이 예측이 승리. 2골이 있으면 예측금은 반환된다. 3골 또는 그 이상의 골이 있으면 이 예측은 패배.
3골 또는 그 이상의 골이 있으면 이 예측은 승리, 2골이 있으면 예측금은 반환된다. 골이 없거나 한 골만 있으면 이 예측은 패배.

ko.detail_football_explain_25_handicap_cont: - 골이 없거나 1 또는 2골이 있을 때, 이 예측은 승리. 3골이나 그 이상의 골이 있을 때 이 예측은 패배
- 3골이나 그 이상의 골이 있을 때, 이 예측은 승리, 골이 없거나 1 또는 2골이 있을 때, 이 예측은 패배.
ko.detail_football_explain_25_3_handicap_co: - 골이 없거나 1 또는 2골이 있을 때, 이 예측은 승리, 3 골이 있을 때, 예측액의 절반은 반환되고 나머지 절반은 패배로 간주. 4골 또는 그 이상의 골이 있을 때, 이 예측은 패배
- 4골 또는 그 이상의 골이 있을 때, 이 예측은 승리. 3골이 있을 때 예측의 절반은 반환되고 나머지 절반은 승리로 간주. 골이 없거나 1 또는 2골이 있을 때 이 예측은 패배.
ko.detail_football_explain_3_handicap_conte: - 골이 없거나 1또는 2골이 있을 때 이 예측은 승리, 3골이 있을 때 예측금은 반환된다. 4골이나 그 이상의 골이 있을 때 이 예측은 패배
- 4골 또는 그 이상의 골이 있을 때 예측은 승리, 3골이 있을 때 예측금은 반환된다. 골이 없거나 1 또는 2골이 있을 때 예측은 패배.
ko.detail_game_content_one: 모든 e스포츠는 규정된 경기시간 내의 결과를 기준으로하며, 별도 공지가 없는한, 무승부결과는 허락되지 않는다. 만약 무승부일 경우, 연장전의 결과를 최종 경기결과로 인정된다. 모든 경기결과는 경기의 공식위원회가 발표한 최종결과를 기준으로 한다.
ko.detail_game_content_two: 경기결과를 예측할 수 없을 경우, 예를 들면 컨닝할 경우, 주최측에서는 경기결과를 수정할 수 있으며, 해당 경기의 배팅은 모두 폐지되면 배팅금액은 전액 환불된다. 또한 주최측에서 경기 일방의 승리를 경기전에 발표할 경우, 모든 배팅은 패지된다. 만약 경기 일방이 경기가 끝나기 전에 경기를 포기할 경우, 이미 완성된 부분의 항목에 대한 배팅만이 유효하다. 만약 배팅 항목이 승패, 핸디캡, 총 경기결과 등일 경우, 배팅은 폐지된다.
ko.detail_game_content_three: 경기 중 한팀만이 참여를 하는 경우 또는 다른한팀이 기권하는 경우, 모든 배팅결과는 폐지된다.
ko.detail_game_content_four: 경기가 완전히 끝나지 않았을 경우, 모든 확정되지 않은 배팅유형은 폐지된다.
ko.detail_game_content_five: 경기가 중단되거나 참가자 문제가 아닌 기술적인 문제로 경기를 다시 진행해야할 경우, 모든 확정되지 않은 배팅유형은 폐지된다.
ko.detail_game_content_seven: 만약 표준경기수량이 수정 또는 플랫폼에서 재공한 수량과 다를 경우, 플랫폼은 해당 항목을 폐기할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_game_explain_champion_content_one: 해당 배팅은 리그의 최종결과를 미리 예측하는 것이며, 예를 들면, 리그 챔피언, 우승 팀, 참가자 및 관련 최종 위치, 어느 회에서 탈락 및 팀과 참가자의 랭킹 등이다. 챔피언 배팅 항목은 당첨 또는 당첨되지 않음 두 가지 결과만 있을 수 있다.
ko.detail_finance_content_one: 모든 예측은 예측에 명시된 시간과 날짜가 지난 후에 해결된다
ko.detail_finance_content_two: 시장 통계는 평판이 좋은 제 3자 출처(예: CoinMarketCap)에서 얻을 수 있다.
ko.detail_finance_content_three: 마켓이 기술적인 문제로 유효 데이터를 획득하지 못하거나 데이터 확인을 할 수 없을 경우, 플랫폼은 믿을 수 있는 제 3자가 데이터를 확인하기 전까지 당첨결과 발표를 연장할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_finance_content_four: 만약 마켓에서 믿을 수 있는 제3자를 찾을 수 없을 경우, 배팅은 폐지되며 배팅금액은 환불된다.
ko.detail_finance_content_five: 플랫폼은 수시로 잘못된 정보를 수정할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: 종가 기준시간은 세계 통일 시간(UTC) 0시를 기준으로 한다. 종가는 마켓 거래량가중평균치로 계산하여 획득한다.
ko.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: 배팅항목은 오직 상승 또는 하락 두 가지 결과만 있으며, 등락폭이 0%일 경우 배팅금액은 환불된다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_one: 당첨 결과를 공식적으로 확인할 수 없을 경우 플랫폼은  공식적인 발표가 이루어질 때까지 지연된 당첨금을 보유 할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_two: 배당률이 명백히 오류로 판단될 경우, 플랫폼은 배팅을 취소 할 수있는 권리가 있다. 여기에는 평균 마켓보다 2배 이상의 확률 오차가 포함된다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_three: 생방송 일시 중지되었으나 당첨 결과가 영향을 받지 않으면 모든 배팅 유형이 결과에 따라 확인된다. 배팅결과를 공식적으로 확인할 수 없을 경우 플랫폼은 배팅을 폐지 할 수있는 권리를 보유한다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_four: 플랫폼은 언제든지 잘못된 정보를 수정할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_five: 당첨규칙이나 형식이 플랫폼에서 승인한 표준과 다르면 플랫폼은 배팅을 폐지할 권리가 있다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_six: 당첨결과를 확인할 수 없을 경우, 플랫폼은 예측 시작시간으로부터 24시간 후에 예측을 폐지할 수 있다 .
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: 복권 통계 및 결과는 제 3자 출처를 기준으로 한다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: 중국 복지 복권,추첨 정보는 http://www.cwl.gov.cn에서 확인할 수 있다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: 한국Lotto, 추첨 정보는 http://www.nlotto.co.kr에서 확인할 수 있다.
ko.detail_lottery_title_content_ten: 미국 PowerBall, 추첨 정보는 https://www.powerball.com/에서 확인할 수 있다.
ko.detail_notice: 문제가 발생하면 고객 서비스 이메일 support@etcgame.com을 통해 문의하십시오

ja.detail_big_title: 次世代のスポーツベッティングプラットフォーム
ja.detail_paragraph_one: ETCgameは革新的なプラットフォームとして、暗号通貨の愛好者たちがスポーツベッティングに参加し、完全に安全かつ透明な方式を用いスポーツ試合の結果を予想することを可能にしています。我々のシステムは、スマートコントラクト技術を使用しているため、完全に透明かつ変更不可、改ざん不可の特性を備えています。よって、参加者は第三者による信頼なしにETCをもってベッティングを行うことが可能です。
ja.detail_paragraph_two_title: なぜイーサリアムクラシック(ETC)を選んだのか
ja.detail_paragraph_two: イーサリアムクラシックはスマートコントラクトを搭載している脱中央集権的なプラットフォームです。スマートコントラクトは完全にプログラムされたまま実行されているため、フリーズや第三者による詐欺、審査、妨害が発生する可能性がありません。イーサリアムクラシックはイーサリアムオリジナルチェーンの良き伝統を受け継いでおり、外部からの干渉や取引に対する主観的な改ざんを一切受け付けません。
ja.detail_paragraph_three: 参加者が予想を行い、ETCをスマートコントラクトアドレス宛に入金します。ベッティング周期終了後、スマートコントラクトは信頼された第三者から試合結果に関するデータを自動的に取得し、それに従い当選者に賞金を配分します。
ja.detail_forecast_football: スポーツベッティング
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: ベッティングの公式結果が確認できない場合、当サイトは公式結果が確認されるまで決済を延期する権利を有します。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: 結果が既に公となっているにも関わらずベッティングがオファーされた場合、当サイトはいかなるベットを無効にする権利を有します。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: 明らかに不正確な表示または計算価格である場合、当サイトはベッティングを無効にする権利を有します。マーケット平均と比較して支払いに100%以上の偏差がある場合を含みます。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: 放送が中断されながらも通常通りに試合が終了した場合、すべてのベッティングにおける決済は最終結果に従って行われます。ベッティングの結果が公式に確認できない場合、当サイトはベッティングを無効にする権利を有します。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: 決済において誤りが生じた場合、当サイトはいかなる時でもそれらの誤りを修正する権利を有します。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: 試合が一般的に受け入れられている形式を忠実に守っていない場合 （例えば、異例の期間の長さ、集計手順、試合形式など）、当サイトはいかなるベッティングについて無効にする権利を有します。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: 試合の規則や形式が、当社が認める規範と異なる場合は、当サイトはいかなるベットについて無効とする権利を有します。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: すべてのベッティングは、別段の定めのない限り、レギュラータイムのみを考慮するものとします。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: 試合が未完了または中止になった場合（例えば失格、中断、退場、引き分けの変更など）、すべての未決ベッティングは無効とみなされます。これらの規則の範囲外のことが発生した場合、当サイトは個別事案ごとに、正当な権利に基づいて決定を下す権利を有します。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: すべてのベッティング （ハーフタイム、前半試合、延長戦、PK戦を除く）は、レギュラータイムのみ考慮されます。試合が中断され、当初のキックオフ時刻から48時間以内に再開された場合、すべてのオープンベットは最終結果に基づいて決済されます。そうでない場合、すべての未決ベットは無効とみなされます。レギュラータイム90分: 別段の規定のない限り、予定の90分終了時の結果に基づいて決済されます。これには、ロスタイムを含みますが、延長戦とPK戦を含みません。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: 試合や相場に関してデータが見つからない場合、開始から24時間が経つとベッティングが無効にされます。
ja.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: 試合の時間、データや結果に関しては信用度の高い第三者より取得します。
ja.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: チャンピオンベットとは、一試合の結果ではなく、連盟戦やリーグ戦全体の結果について予想しベッティングを行うことを指します。チャンピオンベットは通常シーズンが始まる前にベッティングを開始します。ただし、リーグ戦の積中にベッティングをしてもかまいません。国によって倍率が異なります。
ja.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: すなわち三択一のベッティングです。通常ホームアンド、アウェーチームそれぞれの勝敗、または引き分けになるのかを予想することに等しいです。
ja.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: 例えば、イングランド対ドイツの試合の結果を予想する際に、片方が勝つにも、引き分けになるにもベッティングをすることができます。予想する結果によって倍率が異なります。
ja.detail_terms_asian_disks: アジアンハンディキャップ
ja.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: この方式はチームの技術力を考慮に入れ、強いチームにはハンディキャップを負わせます。つまり、強いチームは試合に勝つのみならず、弱いチームより一定数以上のゴートを決める必要もあります。その目的としては引き分けとなる結果を避け、両チームそれぞれの勝つ確率を五分五分になるようにすることです。
ja.detail_terms_scores_results: ハンディキャップを考慮に入れると結果は以下のようになります。
ja.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: 注意点：数字の横にある「＋」は「以上」を意味し、例えば「＋２」なら「決めたゴール数が必ず二つまたはそれより多くなる」を意味します。
ja.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: 可能性が低いが、ハンデ数が整数となる場合、ハンデを加味した試合結果が引き分けとなることがあります。この場合は引き分けではなく、プッシュ（push）と扱います。プッシュが発生した場合、すべての参加者に元金が返還されることになるため、勝者はないということになります。
ja.detail_football_explain_0_content: ベットしたチームが試合に勝った場合は勝ち、引き分け（ゴール差が0）の場合は元金が返還されます。
ja.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: ベットしたチームが試合に勝った場合　－　ベットした人の勝ち。
ja.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: 引き分け　–　元金の半分が返却され、半分が負けと判定され取り上げられます。

ja.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: オーバーアンダーベットとはすなわち、特定の試合の一種類の統計データに対しその数値を予想するものであり、通常は２チームの合計ゴール数を扱います。参加者が試合における実際の数値が選択肢としての数値より大きいかあるいは小さいかを予想します。

ja.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: 基準となる総ゴール数が２、アンダーを選択
総ゴール数が０または１　－　ベットした人の勝ち。総ゴール数が２　－　元金が返却されます。総ゴール数が３以上　－　ベットした人の負け。

ja.detail_game_title: eスポーツベッティング
ja.detail_game_content_one: すべての eスポーツベッティングは、別段の定めのない限り予定された試合/マッチ終了後の結果に基づきます。引き分けの選択肢がない場合、延長戦が行われる場合は延長戦を考慮します。該当するトーナメントの主催者によって宣言された公式結果に基づいて決済されます。
ja.detail_game_content_two: 詐欺的行為など予測不能の原因により競技結果が却下された場合、すべてのベットは無効となり返金されます。主催者が試合開始前に不戦勝を宣言した場合、すべてのベットは無効となります。チームまたはプレイヤーが競技中に棄権した場合、完了した個々のマッチやゲームのみが、公式に宣言された結果に基づき考慮されます。競技が完全に終了しない限り、1x2、ハンディキャップなどのベッティング、及び競技結果はすべて無効となります。
ja.detail_game_content_three: 不戦勝または棄権の場合は、全ての未決ベッティングは無効となります。
ja.detail_game_content_four: 試合またはマッチが終了していない場合、全ての未決ベッティングは無効となります。
ja.detail_game_content_five: 試合またはマッチがプレイヤーに起因しない接続切断または技術的問題が原因で再プレイされた場合、 全ての未決ベッティングは無効となります。
ja.detail_game_content_six: 再プレイされた試合またはマッチは別に取り扱われます。
ja.detail_game_content_seven: マッチの標準的な数が変更された場合または、ベッティング目的で提供されたものと異なる場合、当サイトはベッティングを無効にする権利を有します。
ja.detail_game_explain_champion_content_one: リーグ、グループ、プレイヤー、競技大会におけるアウトライトベッティングとは、チームおよびプレイヤーの最終順位、どのステージまで勝ち抜いたか、またはランキングを予想してベットするもので、予定された試合のプログラム終了後に確定されます。
ja.detail_finance_title: 金融についてのベッティング説明
ja.detail_finance_content_one: すべてのベットは指定したベッティングの時間帯が過ぎてから決済されます。
ja.detail_finance_content_two: 相場に関する統計データは信用度の高い第三者より取得します。
ja.detail_finance_content_three: 相場が有効なデータを取得していないか、データが確認できない場合、当サイトは、信用度の高い第三者のデータを確認するまで、賞金を保留する権利を有します。
ja.detail_finance_content_four: 相場が信用度の高い第三者のデータが見つからない場合、ベッティングが無効にされ、元金は返却されます。
ja.detail_finance_content_five: 当サイトはいかなる賞金の誤りを訂正する権利を有します。
ja.detail_finance_number_asset: デジタル資産相場の基調転換
ja.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: 終値の時間は協定世界時（UTO）0点を基準とします。終値は、各相場の出来高加重平均値によって算出されます。
ja.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: ベッティングが上昇または下落の2つの結果があり、上下幅は0%となると、元金は返却されます。
ja.detail_finance_number_asset_content_thre: 市场交易数据、交易结果以https://coinmarketcap.com/为准。
ja.detail_lottery_title: 宝くじについてのベッティング説明
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_one: 抽選の結果が確認できない場合、当サイトは公式結果が確認されるまで決済を延期する権利を有します。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_two: 賠償率が明らかに誤りがある場合、当サイトははいかなるベッティングを無効にする権利を有します。マーケット平均と比較して支払いに100%以上の偏差がある場合を含みます。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_three: 放送が中断されながらも通常通りに抽選が終了した場合、すべてのベッティングにおける決済は最終結果に従って行われます。ベッティングの結果が公式に確認できない場合、当サイトはベッティングを無効にする権利を有します。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_four: 当サイトはいかなる賞金の誤りを訂正する権利を有します。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_five: 宝くじの規則や書式は当社が定める基準を満たさない場合、当サイトはベッティングを無効にする権利を有します。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_six: 宝くじの抽選に関して結果が見つからない場合、開始から24時間が経つとベッティングが無効にされます。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: 宝くじのデータや結果に関しては信用度の高い第三者より取得します。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: 中国福利宝くじ、抽選結果に関する：http://www.cwl.gov.cnで検索できます。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: 韓国Lotto、抽選結果に関する：http://www.nlotto.co.krで検索できます。
ja.detail_lottery_title_content_ten: アメリカPowerBall、抽選結果に関する：https://www.powerball.com/で検索できます。
ja.detail_notice: 何か問題がありましたら、こちらのメール（support@etcgame.com）までご連絡ください。

ru.detail_paragraph_one: ETCgame is a revolutionary new platform that allows crypto enthusiasts to predict event outcomes and place a wager using a totally secure and transparent method with Ethereum Classic. Our system uses smart contracts, which are transparent, unalterable and tamper-proof, ensuring that participants do not have to trust a third party to honor the wager.
ru.detail_paragraph_two: Ethereum Classic is a decentralized platform that runs smart contracts: applications that run exactly as programmed without any downtime, censorship, fraud or third-party interference. It is a continuation of the original Ethereum blockchain - the classic version preserving untampered history; free from external interference and subjective tampering of transactions.
ru.detail_paragraph_three: Participants make a prediction and deposit Ethereum Classic tokens into the smart contract. Once the prediction period is over, the smart contract automatically checks a trusted third party for the result of the prediction and divides the winnings among the participants.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: If the results of the competition cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to retain or delay the payout until an official confirmation is obtained.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: If a prediction item appears to be accepted after the result of a competition, the platform reserves the right to void such a prediction.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: If the odds are obviously wrong, the platform reserves the right to cancel the relevant prediction. This includes more than one odds error than the average market odds.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: If the live broadcast is paused but the competition is not affected, all prediction types will be awarded based on official results. When the results of the competition of a certain prediction type cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: The platform reserves the right to correct wrong payouts at any time.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: If the event is not based on a formal form (such as unusual time, statistical steps, event formats, etc.), the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: If the rules, or format of an event, differ from the standards accepted by the platform, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: All prediction types will be based on regular time of competition unless otherwise indicated.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: If the event cannot be completed or continued (for example, due to disqualification, distraction, withdrawal from the game, lottery change, etc.), all undetermined prediction types shall be deemed invalid. If there are other items not covered by the rules, the platform will reserve the right to make final decisions to ensure fairness and justice.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: All prediction types (except for halftime, first half, overtime, penalty kicks) will be based on the regular time of the competition. If a competition is disrupted, but resumes within 48 hours of the kickoff, all valid predictions will be awarded based on the final result and all undetermined predictions will be void. Regular 90 minutes: unless otherwise stated, the settlement of soccer prediction will be based on the regular completion time. This includes injury time but does not include overtime and penalty kicks.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: If the competition or market results cannot be found, the prediction is invalid 24 hours after the kickoff.
ru.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: Competition time, data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
ru.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: Outright prediction is a prediction placed on the outcome of an entire league or competition rather than on an individual game. Outright predictions are usually placed before the season starts but are also available even during the course of the competition. Each country carries its own odds.
ru.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: Also known as three-way prediction, this is often used for games which can result in a home win, draw or away win.
ru.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: For example, let’s say you want to make a prediction on the England vs Germany match, you would be able to predict that either England or Germany wins, OR that the match will end in a draw. Each result carries its own odds.
ru.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: This form of prediction takes the skills of the soccer teams into consideration and applies a handicap to the stronger team. This means that the stronger team must not only win, but also exceed the weaker team by a prescribed number of goals. This precludes the match from ending in a draw, leaving the prediction as a binary choice with a near 50/50 chance of success.
ru.detail_terms_scores_results: Handicap and outcomes are as follows:
ru.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: NB: The plus signs in the Team Outcome columns indicate 'or more', e.g., '2+' means 'by 2 goals or more'.
ru.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: In the unlikely event that a whole number is used for the handicap, the handicap-adjusted final score could result in a draw. This situation is not a draw, but a push. In the event of a push, all participants have their original wagers returned as there is no winner.
ru.detail_football_explain_0_content: If either team wins by any margin, they (the winning team) are to be considered as the winning selection. In the event of a draw, all predictions are void and stakes are refunded.
ru.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: - Draw - Half the stake is refunded on this selection. The other half of the stake is classified as a loser.
ru.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_fou: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_six: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_sev: - Draw - Half the stake is settled at the price of the chosen selection. The other half is refunded to the customer.
ru.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_eig: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_content_two: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_content_three: - Draw - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_content_four: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_content_six: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_content_seven: - Draw - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_content_eight: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_two: - Win by 2 or more - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_thr: - Win by exactly 1 - Half the stake is settled at the price of the chosen selection. The other half is refunded to the customer.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_fou: - Draw or lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_six: - Draw or win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_sev: - Lose by exactly 1 - Half the stake is refunded to the customer. The other half is classed as a loser.
ru.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_eig: - Lose by 2 or more - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_1_content_one: Team giving a full ball start:
ru.detail_football_explain_1_content_two: - Win by 2 or more - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_1_content_three: - Win by exactly 1 - All predictions on this selection are void and refunded to the customer.
ru.detail_football_explain_1_content_four: - Draw or lose - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_1_content_five: Team receiving a full ball start:
ru.detail_football_explain_1_content_six: - Win by any score or draw - All predictions on this selection are winners.
ru.detail_football_explain_1_content_seven: - Lose by exactly 1 - All predictions on this selection are void and refunded to the customer.
ru.detail_football_explain_1_content_eight: - Lose by 2 or more - All predictions on this selection are losers.
ru.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: Big or Small will predict a number for a statistic in a given game (usually the combined score of the two teams), and participants predict that the actual number in the game will be either higher or lower than that number.
ru.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: -If there is no goal or only one goal, this prediction wins. If there are two goals, the wager will be returned. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are three or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, the wager will be returned. If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction loses.
ru.detail_football_explain_2_25_handicap_co: -If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, half wager is treated as a win, and the other half will be returned. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a loss. If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction loses.
ru.detail_football_explain_25_handicap_cont: -If there is no goal or 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
ru.detail_football_explain_25_3_handicap_co: -If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a loss. If there are 4 or more goals, the prediction loses.

-If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a win. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
ru.detail_football_explain_3_handicap_conte: -If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, the wager will be returned. If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, the wager will be returned. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
ru.detail_game_content_one: All eSports predictions are subject to the results of the official time of the event, unless otherwise stated. If the outcome of the event does not allow for a draw, the outcome of the overtime event will be considered as the final effective result. The prediction settlement for all events is subject to the official final event results announced by the relevant event organizer.
ru.detail_game_content_two: Based on some unpredictable situations, such as cheating, the organizer can overturn the results and all predictions on the event will be voided and refunded. If the organizer announces that the competition is a win by no matching, that is, the match never starts and the team wins, all predictions are void. If a team or team members withdraw during the game, a valid prediction will be awarded based on the official results. If the prediction type is win or lose, the ball and the match totals will be void unless the match is completed.
ru.detail_game_content_three: In the event that only one team enters or the other team withdraws, all undetermined prediction types are void.
ru.detail_game_content_four: If the event is not completed, all undetermined prediction types will be void.
ru.detail_game_content_five: If the match is based on a break or a replay due to a technical issue rather than a contestant issue, all undetermined prediction types are void.
ru.detail_game_content_six: The replay will be handled separately.
ru.detail_game_content_seven: The platform reserves the right to void predictions if the number of standard events is changed or different from the number provided by the prediction station.
ru.detail_game_explain_champion_content_one: For pre-prediction of the final results of the full season, such as the league title, the winning team, the final standing of the contestants and the competition, the round where it is eliminated, or the standing of the team and the contestant – the championship prediction has only two outcomes: win or lose.
ru.detail_finance_content_one: All predictions are settled after the time and dates specified in the prediction.
ru.detail_finance_content_two: Market trading data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
ru.detail_finance_content_three: If the market does not have valid data based on technical issues, or the data cannot be confirmed, the platform has the right to retain the delayed payout until it is confirmed by a trusted third party.
ru.detail_finance_content_four: If the market cannot find data confirmation from a trusted third party, the prediction will be invalid and the stake will be refunded.
ru.detail_finance_content_five: The platform reserves the right to correct wrong payouts at any time.
ru.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: The closing time is based on 0 UTC. The closing price is calculated based on the weighted average of the volume of each market.
ru.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: Prediction selections only have two outcomes: up or down; if there is 0% up/down, the prediction will be refunded.
ru.detail_finance_number_asset_content_thre: 市场交易数据、交易结果以https://coinmarketcap.com/为准。
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_one: If the results of the lottery cannot be formally confirmed, the platform will have the right to retain the delayed payout until an official confirmation is obtained.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_two: If the odds are obviously wrong, the platform reserves the right to cancel the prediction. This includes more than one odds error than the average market odds.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_three: If the live broadcast is paused and the lottery results are not affected, all prediction types will be awarded based on the results. When the result of a prediction type cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_four: The platform reserves the right to correct the wrong payouts at any time.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_five: If the rules or format of a lottery is different from the standard accepted by the platform, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_six: If the results of the lottery cannot be found, the prediction will become invalid after 24 hours of the result announcement.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: Lottery data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: China Welfare Lottery, the lottery information can be found at http://www.cwl.gov.cn.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: South Korea Lotto, the lottery information can be found at http://www.nlotto.co.kr.
ru.detail_lottery_title_content_ten: US PowerBall, the lottery information can be found at https://www.powerball.com/.
ru.detail_notice: If you have any problems, please contact us via customer service email: support@etcgame.com

Outright predictions are usually placed before the season starts but are also available even during the course of the competition. Each country carries its own odds.
vi.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: Also known as three-way prediction, this is often used for games which can result in a home win, draw or away win.
vi.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: For example, let’s say you want to make a prediction on the England vs Germany match, you would be able to predict that either England or Germany wins, OR that the match will end in a draw. Each result carries its own odds.
vi.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: This form of prediction takes the skills of the soccer teams into consideration and applies a handicap to the stronger team. This means that the stronger team must not only win, but also exceed the weaker team by a prescribed number of goals. This precludes the match from ending in a draw, leaving the prediction as a binary choice with a near 50/50 chance of success.
vi.detail_terms_scores_results: Handicap and outcomes are as follows:
vi.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: NB: The plus signs in the Team Outcome columns indicate 'or more', e.g., '2+' means 'by 2 goals or more'.
vi.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: In the unlikely event that a whole number is used for the handicap, the handicap-adjusted final score could result in a draw. This situation is not a draw, but a push. In the event of a push, all participants have their original wagers returned as there is no winner.
vi.detail_football_explain_0_content: If either team wins by any margin, they (the winning team) are to be considered as the winning selection. In the event of a draw, all predictions are void and stakes are refunded.
vi.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
vi.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: - Draw - Half the stake is refunded on this selection. The other half of the stake is classified as a loser.
vi.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_fou: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.
vi.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_six: - Win by any score - All predictions on this selection are winners.
vi.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_sev: - Draw - Half the stake is settled at the price of the chosen selection. The other half is refunded to the customer.
vi.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_eig: - Lose by any score - All predictions on this selection are losers.

vi.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: Big or Small will predict a number for a statistic in a given game (usually the combined score of the two teams), and participants predict that the actual number in the game will be either higher or lower than that number.
vi.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: -If there is no goal or only one goal, this prediction wins. If there are two goals, the wager will be returned. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are three or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, the wager will be returned. If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction loses.
vi.detail_football_explain_2_25_handicap_co: -If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, half wager is treated as a win, and the other half will be returned. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 2 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a loss. If there is no goal or only 1 goal, this prediction loses.
vi.detail_football_explain_25_handicap_cont: -If there is no goal or 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 3 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
vi.detail_football_explain_25_3_handicap_co: -If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a loss. If there are 4 or more goals, the prediction loses.

-If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, half wager will be returned and the other half treated as a win. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
vi.detail_football_explain_3_handicap_conte: -If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, the wager will be returned. If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction loses.
-If there are 4 or more goals, this prediction wins. If there are 3 goals, the wager will be returned. If there is no goal or only 1 or 2 goals, this prediction loses.
vi.detail_game_content_one: All eSports predictions are subject to the results of the official time of the event, unless otherwise stated. If the outcome of the event does not allow for a draw, the outcome of the overtime event will be considered as the final effective result. The prediction settlement for all events is subject to the official final event results announced by the relevant event organizer.
vi.detail_game_content_two: Based on some unpredictable situations, such as cheating, the organizer can overturn the results and all predictions on the event will be voided and refunded. If the organizer announces that the competition is a win by no matching, that is, the match never starts and the team wins, all predictions are void. If a team or team members withdraw during the game, a valid prediction will be awarded based on the official results. If the prediction type is win or lose, the ball and the match totals will be void unless the match is completed.
vi.detail_game_content_three: In the event that only one team enters or the other team withdraws, all undetermined prediction types are void.
vi.detail_game_content_four: If the event is not completed, all undetermined prediction types will be void.
vi.detail_game_content_five: If the match is based on a break or a replay due to a technical issue rather than a contestant issue, all undetermined prediction types are void.
vi.detail_game_content_six: The replay will be handled separately.
vi.detail_game_content_seven: The platform reserves the right to void predictions if the number of standard events is changed or different from the number provided by the prediction station.
vi.detail_game_explain_champion_content_one: For pre-prediction of the final results of the full season, such as the league title, the winning team, the final standing of the contestants and the competition, the round where it is eliminated, or the standing of the team and the contestant – the championship prediction has only two outcomes: win or lose.
vi.detail_finance_content_one: All predictions are settled after the time and dates specified in the prediction.
vi.detail_finance_content_two: Market trading data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
vi.detail_finance_content_three: If the market does not have valid data based on technical issues, or the data cannot be confirmed, the platform has the right to retain the delayed payout until it is confirmed by a trusted third party.
vi.detail_finance_content_four: If the market cannot find data confirmation from a trusted third party, the prediction will be invalid and the stake will be refunded.
vi.detail_finance_content_five: The platform reserves the right to correct wrong payouts at any time.
vi.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: The closing time is based on 0 UTC. The closing price is calculated based on the weighted average of the volume of each market.
vi.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: Prediction selections only have two outcomes: up or down; if there is 0% up/down, the prediction will be refunded.
vi.detail_finance_number_asset_content_thre: 市场交易数据、交易结果以https://coinmarketcap.com/为准。
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_one: If the results of the lottery cannot be formally confirmed, the platform will have the right to retain the delayed payout until an official confirmation is obtained.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_two: If the odds are obviously wrong, the platform reserves the right to cancel the prediction. This includes more than one odds error than the average market odds.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_three: If the live broadcast is paused and the lottery results are not affected, all prediction types will be awarded based on the results. When the result of a prediction type cannot be formally confirmed, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_four: The platform reserves the right to correct the wrong payouts at any time.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_five: If the rules or format of a lottery is different from the standard accepted by the platform, the platform reserves the right to void the prediction.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_six: If the results of the lottery cannot be found, the prediction will become invalid after 24 hours of the result announcement.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: Lottery data and results will be obtained from reputable third parties.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: China Welfare Lottery, the lottery information can be found at http://www.cwl.gov.cn.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: South Korea Lotto, the lottery information can be found at http://www.nlotto.co.kr.
vi.detail_lottery_title_content_ten: US PowerBall, the lottery information can be found at https://www.powerball.com/.
vi.detail_notice: If you have any problems, please contact us via customer service email: support@etcgame.com

zh-Hant.detail_paragraph_one: EtcGame作為革命性的全新平台，允許加密貨幣粉絲參與預測並使用完全安全和透明的方法投注。我們的系統使用智能合約技術，具備完全透明、不可更改、不可篡改的功能，確保參與者無需第三方信任即可使用ETC執行投注。
zh-Hant.detail_paragraph_two: 以太經典是一個運作智能合約的去中心化平台。智能合約完全按照程序運行，不會出現停機，審查，欺詐或第三方干擾的可能性。 以太經典秉承以太坊原鏈 -保留了未經篡改的歷史; 不受外部干擾和對交易的主觀篡改。
zh-Hant.detail_paragraph_three: 參與者作出預測並將以太經典（ETC）充入智能合約。預測周期結束後，智能合約自動檢測受信任的第三方獲得預測結果，向參與者分配彩金。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_one: 如果比賽結果無法得到正式確認，本平台將有權利保留延遲派彩直至得到官方的正式確認。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_two: 如果某個投注項目出現在已經有比賽結果之後仍接受投注，本平台則保留作廢該投注的權利。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_three: 如果賠率明顯有誤，本平台保留取消該投注的權利。這包括比平均市場大於一倍賠率誤差。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_four: 如果直播停頓而比賽並未受影響，所有投注類型會根據正式比賽結果派彩。當某個投注類型比賽結果無法得到正式確認，本平台保留作廢該投注的權利。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_five: 本平台有權在任何時候糾正錯誤派彩。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_six: 如果賽事並不是依據正規形式進行(例如異常賽時，統計步驟，賽事格式等)，平台保留作廢該投注的權利。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_seven: 如果一個賽事的規則或格式異於本平台接受的標準，本平台保留作廢該投注的權利。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eight: 所有投注類型將依據正規的賽時除非有另外標明。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_nine: 如果賽事無法完成或繼續(例如鑒於取消資格，受到干擾，退出比賽，抽籤有所改變等)，所有未能確定的投注類型無效。若有其他未被規則涵蓋的項目，平台將保留做出針對個案最終性決定的權利，並且確保公平公正。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_ten: 所有投注類型(除了半場，上半場，加時賽，點球賽)將以比賽的常規時間為準。 如果一項比賽被干擾但是在開賽後48小時內繼續比賽，所有有效投注依據最終比賽結果派彩，而所有未決定的投注作廢。 常規90分鐘：除非另有標明，否則足球投注的結算將以比賽的常規時間為準。包括傷停補時但不包括加時賽和點球賽的成績。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_eleven: 比賽或市場結果無法被找到的，則在開球後24小時後預測無效。
zh-Hant.detail_forecast_rules_paragraph_twelve: 比賽時間、比賽數據和結果將從信譽良好的第三方獲取。
zh-Hant.detail_terms_conditions_win_content: 奪冠投注是指投注全聯盟或聯賽的結果，而非一場比賽結果。奪冠投注通常在賽季開始前下注，但也可在聯賽過程中投注。每個國家的賠率不同。
zh-Hant.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content: 也即三向投注，通常同於預測主客場勝負或平手結果。
zh-Hant.detail_terms_victory_defeat_content_seco: 例如，您選擇預測英格蘭和德國的比賽結果，可以兩者投其一，或者猜平手。每個結果的賠率不同。
zh-Hant.detail_terms_asian_disks_content: 這種玩法加入了對球隊技術的考慮，對強隊而言可以讓分。也即，強隊不但要贏得比賽，還需要以確定的進球數超過弱隊。這避免了比賽踢平的結果，讓預測成為五五開的選擇。
zh-Hant.detail_terms_scores_results_focus: 注意：球隊成績欄的加號表示「或更多」，如，「2+」表示「2球或更多」『。
zh-Hant.detail_terms_scores_results_focus_second: 可能性比較小的情況是，當整數用於讓分盤時，讓分調整的最終比分可能導致平手。這種情況不算作平手，而是走盤（push）。發生走盤的，所有參與者的原始投注資金將會被退還，也即沒有贏家。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_0_content: 如果任何一隊以任何比分勝出，投注該隊獲勝的為贏。如為平局，所有投注計為作廢，投注金退還。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_two: 球隊以任何比分勝出 - 投注項為贏。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_thr: 平局 - 投注於此項的一半投注金退還客戶。另一半的投注被判為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_fou: 球隊以任何比分輸 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_six: 球隊以任何比分勝出 - 投注項為贏。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_sev: 平局 - 一半投注按照所選項賠率進行結算，另一半投注退還客戶。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_0_05_content_eig: 球隊以任何比分輸 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_content_two: 球隊以任何比分勝出 - 投注項為贏。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_content_three: 平局 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_content_four: 球隊以任何比分輸 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_content_six: 球隊以任何比分勝出 - 投注項為贏。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_content_eight: 球隊以任何比分輸 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_two: 球隊以多於對方至少兩球勝出 - 投注項為贏。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_thr: 球隊以多於對方正好一球勝出 - 一半投注按照所選項賠率進行結算，另一半投注退還客戶。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_fou: 平局或以任何比分輸 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_six: 平局或以任何比分贏得賽事 - 投注項為贏。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_sev: 球隊輸掉一球 - 投注於此項的一半投注金將退還客戶。另一半的投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_05_1_content_eig: 球隊輸掉至少兩球 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_1_content_two: 球隊以多於對方至少兩球勝出 - 投注項為贏。

zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_1_content_four: 平局或以任何比分輸 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_1_content_six: 平局或以任何比分贏得賽事 - 投注項為贏。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_1_content_seven: 球隊輸掉一球 - 所有投注作廢，投注金退還客戶。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_1_content_eight: 球隊輸掉至少兩球 - 此項投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_O_U_content_one: 大小球投注也即預測體育預測中給定比賽的一項統計數字（通常是兩隊比分之和），參與者預測的比賽實際數字應比該數字大或小。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_2_handicap_conte: - 如果比賽中沒有進球或只有一個進球，投注為贏。如果剛好有兩個進球，投注金被退還。如果有三個或更多的進球，投注為輸。
- 如果比賽中有三個或更多的進球，投注為贏。如果剛好有兩個進球，投注金被退還。如果沒有進球或只有一個進球，投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_2_25_handicap_co: - 如果比賽中沒有進球或只有一個進球，投注為贏。如果剛好有兩個進球，則一半投注金為贏，另一半將被返還。如果有三個或更多的進球，投注為輸。
- 如果比賽中有三個或更多的進球，投注為贏。如果剛好有兩個進球，則一半投注金將被返還，另一半為輸。如果沒有進球或只有一個進球，投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_25_handicap_cont: - 如果比賽中沒有進球或是只有一個或兩個進球，投注為贏。如果有三個或更多的進球，投注為輸。
- 如果比賽中有三個或更多的進球，投注為贏。如果沒有進球或是只有一個或兩個進球，投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_25_3_handicap_co: - 如果比賽中沒有進球或只有一個或兩個進球，投注為贏。如果剛好有三個進球，一半投注金將被返還，另一半為輸。如果有四個或更多的進球，投注為輸。
- 如果比賽中有四個或更多進球，投注為贏。如果剛好有三個進球，一半投注金將被返還，另一半為贏。如果沒有進球或是只有一個或兩個進球，投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_football_explain_3_handicap_conte: - 如果比賽中沒有進球或只有一個或兩個進球，投注為贏。如果剛好有三個進球，投注金將被返還。如果有四個或更多的進球，投注為輸。
- 如果比賽中有四個或更多的進球，投注為贏。如果剛好有三個進球，投注金將被返還。如果沒有進球或只有一個或兩個進球，投注為輸。
zh-Hant.detail_game_content_one: 所有電子競技投注皆以法定完場時間的賽事結果為準，除非特別聲明。若賽事結果不允許出現和局，因而進行的加時賽的賽事結果將被視為最終有效賽事結果。所有賽事的投注結算以相關賽事組織方所公布的官方最終賽事結果為準。
zh-Hant.detail_game_content_two: 基於一些無法預測的情況 - 比如作弊- 組辦單位可以推翻賽果,該賽事所有的投注作廢及退還。 如果組辦單位宣布該場比賽為不戰先勝 - 即比賽從未開始而其中的隊伍獲勝 - 則所有投注作廢。 如果一支隊伍或隊員在比賽進行中退賽,則根據正式賽果派彩給只已完成投注項目的有效投注。投注類型如勝負盤，讓球盤以及總比分結果將被作廢,除非比賽完整完成。
zh-Hant.detail_game_content_three: 在只有一支隊伍參賽或另一隊告退，則所有未決定的投注類型作廢。
zh-Hant.detail_game_content_four: 如果賽事沒有完整完成，則所有未決定的投注類型作廢。
zh-Hant.detail_game_content_five: 如果賽事基於中斷或因技術問題而非參賽者問題的情況造成重賽，則所有未決定的投注類型作廢。
zh-Hant.detail_game_content_seven: 如果標準賽事數量被更改或有別於投注站提供的數目，平台保留作廢投注的權利。
zh-Hant.detail_game_explain_champion_content_one: 預先投注於完整賽季最終賽果，比如聯賽冠軍，獲勝小組，參賽者以及競賽有關的最終位置，哪一輪被淘汰，或隊伍和參賽者排名。總冠軍投注項目只有贏的獎金或輸賭注兩種結果。
zh-Hant.detail_finance_content_one: 所有投注在預測規定的時間和日期後結算。
zh-Hant.detail_finance_content_two: 市場交易數據、交易結果將從信譽良好的第三方取得。
zh-Hant.detail_finance_content_three: 如果市場基於技術問題未獲得有效數據或數據無法得到確認，平台有權利保留延遲派彩直至得到可信任第三方的數據確認。
zh-Hant.detail_finance_content_four: 如果市場找不到可信第三方數據確認，預測無效，投注將退還。
zh-Hant.detail_finance_content_five: 本平台有權在任何時候糾正錯誤派彩。
zh-Hant.detail_finance_number_asset_content_one: 收盤時間以世界統一時間（UTC) 0點為準。收盤價按各市場成交量加權平均值計算得出。
zh-Hant.detail_finance_number_asset_content_two: 投注項目只有上漲或下跌兩種結果；如果遇到漲跌幅為0%，投注將退還。
zh-Hant.detail_finance_number_asset_content_thre: 市场交易数据、交易结果以https://coinmarketcap.com/为准。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_one: 如果開獎結果無法得到正式確認，本平台將有權利保留延遲派彩直至得到官方的正式確認。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_two: 如果賠率明顯有誤，本平台保留取消該投注的權利。這包括比平均市場大於一倍賠率誤差。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_three: 如果直播停頓而開獎結果並未受影響，所有投注類型會根據結果派彩。當某個投注類型結果無法得到正式確認，本平台保留作廢該投注的權利。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_four: 本平台有權在任何時候糾正錯誤派彩。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_five: 如果一個彩票的規則或格式異於本平台接受的標準，本平台保留作廢該投注的權利。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_six: 彩票開獎結果無法被找到的，則在彩票開獎後24小時後預測無效。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_seven: 彩票數據和結果將從信譽良好的第三方獲取。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_eight: 中國福利彩票，開獎信息可在http://www.cwl.gov.cn查詢。
zh-Hant.detail_lottery_title_content_nine: 韓國Lotto，開獎信息可在http://www.nlotto.co.kr查詢。
zh-Hant.detail_notice: 如有遇到任何問題，請通過客服email與我們聯繫：support@etcgame.com
